welcome_message_body: Welcome to Vegachi, Colombia! Get ready to experience the warmth and charm of our beautiful city, known for its stunning natural landscapes and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Vegachi has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Amalfi Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Amalfi Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Puerto Berrio Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Puerto Berrio Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
